bibl.title: Lost at Sea: Pythermus as an Anti-Odysseus? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Article based on a paper given in Lampeter at the Celtic Conference in Classics. - P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852), col. xiv, 19-28 = Posidipp. 93 A.-B. - An atypical nauagikon. - Homeric echoes. - Posidippus as interpreter of Homer. - Hellenistic variations.
bibl.seg: DI NINO Margherita Maria, Lost at Sea: Pythermus as an Anti-Odysseus? Avec résumé en anglais.

Article based on a paper given in Lampeter at the Celtic Conference in Classics. - P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852), col. xiv, 19-28 = Posidipp. 93 A.-B. - An atypical nauagikon. - Homeric echoes. - Posidippus as interpreter of Homer. - Hellenistic variations.
